item.description:
Everybody Bring a casserole and a folding chair. BYOB's. Just let's get together for a few hours. Not a strategy meeting or anything...whatever will we talk about? Bring the kids, too! I just want to open my home for a light moment that we might enjoy downtime. And you know the theme..."I'll bring a casserole..."

I also thought that we could have a story or two from those who would like to tell their fave Norman Rockwell / 'This was America' story from their own past.

Sound good?

Please RSVP.

John Puzzo
75 Williams Street
Plainville , CT 06062
860.351.5186 (Phone/Fax)
J_Puzzo@comcast.net
item.name: Pot Luck @ John Puzzo's House
